Psy.Name: Lighting Flash
Psy.Effect: A bright light flash that blinds all models with in a d4" diameter. Models may meke a AG save to negate the effects (D12 under AG). Any model that fails gets their M,H+H, RW, AG cut in half for d3 turns, but don’t neet make a HF save when confronting a model with a high HF.
